content: the end of the chain 15 down at the base to secure everything in place fasten_off weave in ends 3 k a m e crochet designs 2025 by krisztina anna edomer all rights reserved thank you for choosing this pattern for your project when you make it i d like to see it please tag me @k a m e_crochet or use hashtag #kamecrochet on instagram or other social media so i can admire your projects you can also join my facebook group where you can get updates on new pattern releases or help with existing ones if you get stuck https //www facebook com/groups/975632939436008/ ref=bookmarks if you have any questions about the pattern you can also contact me directly at kamecrochet@gmail com or youtube https //www youtube com/channel/uci4snch5kosqzqfrmbzebqq ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/kame-crochet facebook https //www facebook com/kamecrochet instagram https //www instagram com/k a m e_crochet happy crocheting 4
